website_summaries.verdict: A well-made solution for those who don't have room for a multi-level cage.
pros: Plenty of room for two guinea pigs
Secure door locks should prevent unauthorized excursions
cons: A few owners think it's hard to clean, and say it is not as simple to assemble as advertised

customer_reviews.title: Wrong cage shipped twice.
customer_reviews.text: My son has several Guinea Pigs. The first picture is the cage we currently have, and the one I have ordered TWICE- but gotten the cage in the second picture. Which is drastically smaller. I looked through the reviews and saw that multiple people have been given this second cage, when thinking they are ordering the first. It seems no one notices the difference, but I do because I already own the giant rabbit cage. It’s very upsetting. I hope this is fixed, but I highly doubt it since for the last few years; the second cage has been the one shipped out.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Love all Kaytee products & They have great C.S.
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought the smaller version,- half the size... I adopted her in a terrarium so I thought it was a palace and so did she for a while... she grew and I wanted something bigger for her....I definitely got it. Box looked banged up- I was worried but all was perfect inside. Yes, I was challenged putting it together... But it's together now and I LOVE it.... More importantly Gwynnie Pigtrow is a happy girl.
customer_reviews.author: sitatara

customer_reviews.title: Too small for two guinea pigs
customer_reviews.text: Guinea pigs need to be sold in pairs. They need a companion. With that said, this is a nice cage but it is not long enough. It is a great cage with the wheels and easy access for cleaning. The water bottle did not come with anything to attach to the cage so I used my old one. Also the bowl it came with for pellets is way too tall for guinea pigs. My guinea pigs do not go on the top level but they do like being under it. This cage is too small.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Ledges and ladders are just ok, size is great
customer_reviews.text: It was a little bit hard to snap the two sides together and the ledges were quite hard to snap on. The ladders are ok but if you take them off to clean the cage, they wear down quickly. Overall I like the color and size (plenty of room for two guinea pigs if they get along), but would hesitate to buy again simply because the ladders and ledges aren't up to my standards. I ended up just taking them out and my piggies use other accessories instead.
customer_reviews.author: GA Teacher

customer_reviews.title: I like the cage a lot now that I have it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the cage a lot now that I have it set up. I got it to get my guinea pig Ringo a friend. Now Ringo and George happily live in this spacious cage. The huge issue is it was HORRIBLE to set up. The pieces didn't fit together at all. It was a very big struggle. The top is pretty flimsy too. The cage is also a pain to clean so I recommend fleece bedding. (which ironically I don't have any yet) I have ordered a nice fleece to use instead of bedding because the cage gets really hard to clean. Altogether this cage is very large my guinea pigs really like it!
customer_reviews.author: jakans

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Breaks Easily
customer_reviews.text: Both times I ordered this item, it arrived with broken areas on the plastic part of it, which was really disappointing. I volunteer doing wildlife rehab and had been waiting on this cage for a specific animal who was growing and needed the extra room. I returned the first one and had another one ordered, and when that one also was broken, I just had to make due with it and use duct tape on it because I could not wait for yet another one to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: MelanieW

customer_reviews.title: Bad dimensions listed
customer_reviews.text: Dont rely in the dimensions listed. It is NOT 18 in tall. I needed it to fit in an area that is 19.25 in high and even without the casters it would not fit. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I received the correct product and the dimensions are as described. It was very easy to put together (took about 2 min) and is very sturdy. The ladder up to the second level is easy for my guinea pig to use. This size is perfect for him. I previously had built him a much larger cage, but we are moving and I needed something more easily transportable. I was worried it would be too small, but it is actually perfect. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Arianna S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect For our hedgehog. She doesnt seem to use the ramp and we did away with the hay holder. Plenty of space for a wheel, food dish and hideaway and for her to run around.
customer_reviews.author: BrowniebakingBertha

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to put together and so much larger than I ...
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for our daughter's new rabbit, it arrived quickly. It was very easy to put together and so much larger than I thought it would be. The accessories that came with it also helped out. I would recommend it to anyone looking for an indoor rabbit cage .
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: I think I received a returned cage, the ladder was the wrong size no way for it to touch the bottom, the front wire was bent and there was no ties to attach the water bottle as the instructions said it did. Sadly the time for me receiving a replacement was after my granddaughters birthday so I had to order from another site and it will be here tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Books2

customer_reviews.title: Love this cage.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cage for my hamster! Was easy to put together, might need two people but the build quality will last a long time. Love the wheels on the bottom making it easy to move around the floor. The price is a bit high, but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it new.
customer_reviews.text: I got this used and it was supposed to be in good condition. I wish I would’ve just gotten it brand new. It came dirty and I had to clean it out. Several places on the plastic are cracked and there are bars that are bent. The front 2 doors are not sturdy at all and I will probably have to zip tie them closed. Not happy. I do love the size of the cage. Would have been happy if it was in better condition.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great space and Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the product. Tons of space for out guinea pig and easy to clean. The slide to the second floor was useless as it is too flimsy for our guinea so we removed it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality but good size
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cage on wheels that was large enough for 2 guinea pigs. So it is that. But the "chew proof" locks are people proof - a simple wire closure would work much better. The cage bottom arrives in 2 halves & where it joins is difficult to clean, there is a plastic piece that fits over the join but not well. Nice size but not a great product - the plastic cage latches are the biggest problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rafter

customer_reviews.title: It is definately a really BIG cage!!!
customer_reviews.text: The size of this cage is large enough to comfortably house my two (Dwarf sized) Lionhead rabbits. I chose not to put both platforms in, only one, but I have a litter box and hideaway hut in there as well. The rabbits still have room enough to run about! The only reason for 4 star rating is because the bottom comes in two parts and you have to fit them together (kind of a pain) and this creates a seam between the two parts.
customer_reviews.author: jody herman

customer_reviews.title: Great home base for larger play area
customer_reviews.text: I think this cage alone is way too small for guinea pigs. But I keep the door open 24/7 so my piggies can go in in and out as they please into a bigger play area that's gated off. I ordered a second shelf so that it has two levels for eating. I also built a cover over the bars of the door so their feet don't get stuck when going in and out of the cage. Great sturdy cage that the piggies can sleep and eat in.
customer_reviews.author: Javo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't open on top
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to get my rabbits out because it doesn't open on top! I have to take the entire cage off each time I clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Looks great and rolls great. The ramp is a little flimsy and doesn’t quite stay touching the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Poulson

customer_reviews.title: Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: Did not like that it came in 2 parts instead of a solid bottom as one piece. Wish the bottom was one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia

customer_reviews.title: Great Cage!
customer_reviews.text: love it! It's a very very large cage,I have one currently for my 2 guinea pigs. they love it too. plenty of room. one down fall for me is it can be a little difficult to clean out Just bc of how big it is, but it not really a big deal, having a great big cage for my pets make it worth it. will be getting a second one for my rabbit.
customer_reviews.author: Racheal

customer_reviews.title: Cracked and damaged
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this to come because I had been needing a cage for my bunnies. When the box arrived it was damaged and when I took the cage out there were 3 large cracks in the pan of the cage. I am very upset because I needed it. I
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Choy

customer_reviews.title: Great cage!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, clean and fit different items in for our guinea pig. The double level provides challenge and fun for our guinea pig.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Baumert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect design, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect design, poor quality. Second floor board is too long so when animals are on it, it bend. Even though there is a divider on the middle of bottom, it's OK for me. Poor plastic, poor metal cage. Since I already set it up, if I suffer a serious problem, definitely I will request a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jing Shi

customer_reviews.title: WELL WORTH THE MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cage. Most importantly, my furry lil baby loves it. It’s not exactly the easiest to clean considering you have to take off the entire metal frame, but it’s great. And I really like the locking feature on the two doors. And the extra locks on the top doors!! My rabbit is an escape artist and hasn’t figured out how to get out of this one yet!
customer_reviews.author: bailey

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: You have to take the whole thing apart to clean it properly. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID LAWSTON

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: This came broken and cracked. I ordered a replacement but now have to wait several days while my rabbit makes a mess in the temporary dog crate.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Only one ramp but nice
customer_reviews.text: My pigs love this cage but it only had one ramp. Otherwise it would have 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: They LOVE it! Leaving the large doors open has actually ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2 large guinea pigs. They LOVE it! Leaving the large doors open has actually made them more sociable and calm. Go figure!
customer_reviews.author: Chris P

customer_reviews.title: That the ramp doesn't sit right but it's great other than that
customer_reviews.text: I love the style my dwarf bunny is in heaven with it the ramp didn't really sit right so I took it out and the tray doesn't stay to good that he can jump up on but other than that it is great and would recommend it to the others exactly as pictures beside the ramp but but bunny will jump anyways so no big deal
customer_reviews.author: jesse pippin

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot for the price you pay. Very large and good quality. I bought for two guinea pigs and they love it. The only thing is they don't like the ramps but have learned to dump the food bowl from below.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Good rabbit cage
customer_reviews.text: Great cafe for a rabbit. The high sides stopped him from spraying outside of the cage. It’s kind of a pain to get the litter box out of because you have to take the top off. But it’s not that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Emery

customer_reviews.title: To much money ! And not friendly to clean!!! Buyer be ware!!!
customer_reviews.text: The hardest cage to clean! The 2 step slides broke the snaps break off if your animal's goes underneath they snap off.
customer_reviews.author: Kataryna F

customer_reviews.title: Great for small pets
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kids pet bunnies my daughter loves it very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Peachlyn

customer_reviews.title: No bottom tray for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Love the cage until we realized it doesn't have the easy cleaning option at the bottom as stayed. You have to take it apart to clean it. Really disappointed because the description said it had this.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Carver

customer_reviews.title: great home for my rabbit
customer_reviews.text: i wish you could open it from the top and not just the side but i still love it
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have had Kaytee products in the past & always have been happy but this cage was hard to assemble & keeps coming apart. The upper levels & ramps are flimsy & I had to remove them. Very disappointed & would return if I still had the box.
customer_reviews.author: David D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: not chew proof as the box says
customer_reviews.text: i love the idea of my little guy having room to roam.....just not after chewing his way out. The box says CHEW PROOF. My guy has managed to chew the wire off the door. Yes he is a rabbit. A baby at that. I can not recommend right now.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Elden

customer_reviews.title: great crate.
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble. Good looking. easy to clean. used for a guinea pig.
customer_reviews.author: Posterco

customer_reviews.title: I love having the cage on wheels.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage. It's nice and roomy for the girls and I love that I can roll it from room to room so they can be near us. It comes with everything they need, water bottle, hay ben and food bowl along with a ledge and ramp.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Herndon

customer_reviews.title: Not built they Way it claims
customer_reviews.text: I bought ithis because of the 2 shevles but the is built so you have to shelf on lowest rung or you cant hang the shelf. Since buying it one of the doors stick & you have yank downward to close it or it pops back open . .
customer_reviews.author: Soft Taco Queen

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, but ok price
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent cage. It’s the cheapest for size, so get what you pay for. Water bottle is not good. Plastic is flimsy. Does the job, but I only recommend for size v. Price
customer_reviews.author: Seanna Roysden

customer_reviews.title: Can't purchase ramps or parts that break after a few months!
customer_reviews.text: Had for 3 months already need replace a shelf and both ramps ! Cannot find them anywhere to purchase?! Really aggravating!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Buy
customer_reviews.text: The construction of this cage is beyond flimsy. I’ve only had it for 4 months and the door is falling off. The slide out cleaning function is nice in theory but the design is impractical and I have to clean it out the old fashioned way. Guinea pigs are pretty heavy chewers and the cheap plastic food bowl detached from the cage constantly leaving food all over the top level. Definitely NOT worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Nevill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my bunny. Good size
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and put together. I have had it for a few months and would purchase agagin
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Brouillette

customer_reviews.title: very nice and roomy
customer_reviews.text: finally one big enough for 2 guinney pigs. very nice and roomy. They each have beds opposite each other.
customer_reviews.author: Judith L.

customer_reviews.title: Great cage
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and our little girls love their new house!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey P

customer_reviews.title: solid product
customer_reviews.text: Great size for medium rodents! A little bulky when cleaning and reaching in for pets but easy enough to snap apart and back together!
customer_reviews.author: erin marie gibison

customer_reviews.title: A Terrible Assembly
customer_reviews.text: The assemble does not work properly; putting together the two-component base parts is impossible due to wrong parts.
customer_reviews.author: Stella B.

customer_reviews.title: Floor has a divider
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a big cage for my now adult rabbit so he could stretch out. I knew the floor of this cage came in 2 pieces but didn't realize that when assembled, there is a half inch raised divider where the 2 pieces meet. This kind of defeats the large size of this cage because my rabbit cannot lay over the divider. So, while the floor dimensions are 48"x24", in reality there are 2 floor areas of 24"x24" because of the divider in the floor. I also found that the plastic floor is kind of flimsy and flexes easily, Same with the side shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy Terrible quality Doesn’t go together easily hard to put together
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great multiple access points make reaching everything a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey K Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I received wheels, a food bowl, and a ramp. The cage I have received has been USED, and I didn’t choose for it to come that way!!
customer_reviews.author: DaJanira Hathorn

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: too small for even one guinea pig to live comfortably. going to donate
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Hedgehogs: Wired Cage
customer_reviews.text: This cage is the only one i trust that is wired and can be used for hedgehogs specifically. The Base pan is really deep which even climbers have a hard time trying to escape. The cage is huge and very spacious. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: bunnykinz

customer_reviews.title: Water bottle doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Mediocre at best. The water bottle doesn’t even work, no water will come out of it. It seems very cheap and poorly made. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Claire Boughton

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I paid for the cage measuring 48x24, but I was sent one measuring 30x18
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Eddiba

customer_reviews.title: It performs admirably once set up, just be careful ...
customer_reviews.text: It performs admirably once set up, just be careful. the parts are plastic, and may break when trying to force them together.
customer_reviews.author: Christine and Dan Cowen

customer_reviews.title: Great seller.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, just what we were looking for!! Great seller.
customer_reviews.author: CLL

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Really good easy to clean my gerbil loves his new home
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Good for Guinea pigs
customer_reviews.text: The cage has lots of room for Guinea pigs to run around. We easily taught the Guinea pigs how to go up the ramp to the platform. They seem to love the cage and run around a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Pam L

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The wires are a little flimsy but my guinea pig loves it! Got it on time and looks just like the package. My guinea pig did not like the ramps so I took them out. I would recommend using fleece bedding because it is so big.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Dineen

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Nice cage. Missing some parts and cant figure out how to contact anyone to have them sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Lhermans

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This cage is the biggest piece of junk and does not fit together right. It is definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, totally worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!! great materials and pretty easy to ensamble, my to guinea pigs fit perfect on it.
customer_reviews.author: JDLR

customer_reviews.title: ... Rabbit Cage I used for my Guinea pigs the loved it, lots a space to move around
customer_reviews.text: Even this is a Rabbit Cage I used for my Guinea pigs the loved it ,lots a space to move around
customer_reviews.author: Isolde Krenzer

customer_reviews.title: It is huge but not easy to access the inside or clean
customer_reviews.text: this cage is huge and our 3 guinea pigs love it. It was very hard to put together as it only came with picture instructions. Where the openings are it is hard to access the animals and clean it. but all in all it is a good cage and I would recommend it. also a bit of warning, the metal is cheap and bends very easily also one of the ladders won't stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie Mischo

customer_reviews.title: Top and Bottom Don't Clip Together Well
customer_reviews.text: The top does not clip on well to the bottom - other than that it does exactly what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: marc blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and space of this cage. However, putting it together was a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: NAM

customer_reviews.title: This item is Good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the money. Very large and easy to put together. I am glad I purchased this for our small animals.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: the shelf fell down and was difficult to put back but so far has stayed. Lily has stood on the food container which makes it come out of the holder pretty easily...then flips upside down in which she cannot get to the now dumped out food
customer_reviews.author: kimmarie

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a well made product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for 2 guinea pigs and it ended up being way to large. Seemed like a well made product, but humungous.
customer_reviews.author: Mooshwa

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This item is Flimsy at best - gate does not fit - water bottle defective with no way to return or get it replaced without sending the entire contraption back! The wheels have to be jammed in and do not fit flush. Do NOT buy this item. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Home for the Guinea Pigs
customer_reviews.text: This is our second home for this pair of guinea pigs, they are now about 5 years old and the items included with this one are great, especially like the timothy bin. The water bottle leaks a little but is still the best one we've found for this. Overall, very pleased with this one.
customer_reviews.author: wayneintn

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good rabbit cage for room.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of it. It is very big and roomy. I like how it opens on top. However, it is hard to disassemble to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Davis

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pig cage
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn't come with the wheels. It didn't come with any instructions or a booklet to look at to see where everything went. I wasn't happy about the fact I didn't receive the wheels with it. I was also hoping that the food container had a spot that it went in to keep it in place. I'm going to have to get another food container that the guinea pig won't tip over and dump out. Over all, the price is really good and it is a nice little cage. This was a birthday gift for my son. He just got a baby guinea pig.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids loved this habitat for their guinea pigs.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Torres

product_meta.title: Kaytee My First Home 2-level Pet Habitat
product_meta.description: Size:48 X 24| Color:BlueKaytee's new 48" x 24" Rabbit Home with 2-Piece Base provides your pet rabbit with a full 8 square feet of living space! The base and cage wire are packaged in 2 separate pieces which only need to be assembled one time for permanent use. Designed for easy assembly, the patent-pending cage provides pet rabbits with the recommended 8 square feet of living space. The Rabbit Home features front and top access doors, two ramps and shelves and casters for mobility. Dimensions: 48"x24"x16.5"
feature_bullets: Ideal habitat for rabbits or guinea pigs
Top and front wire doors for easy access
Solid surface comfort shelves and safety ramp.Bar Spacing: 1 inch
Chew proof latches and tab locks for safety
Includes: 2 comfort shelves, 2 wavy ramps, food dish and casters

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
